page.title: 16ONE GIRL'S BUSY LIFE
page.content: There are many clubs around the area; I go to a dancing school in Bromley North twice a week. I go there after school on a Thursday by bus. The dance studio is very big: I am in a class with about fifteen other girls and we all wear leotards and tights. This dancing is modern or jazz. The school also offers tap and ballet. I also have guitar and flute lessons. This week our school is performing "Joseph and his Amazing Technicolour Dreamcoat", which is a musical. I have a main part in this play, which we have been working on for six months. The play is set in Biblical times, but has been modernised with jazz music. The play will run for four nights. My friend says she rarely goes to the cinema now but watches videos instead.
